title: New Mimic View
content:
<!-- Vertical gauge EP Toto -->
<path d="M30,180 l16,0 l0,-160 l-16,0 z" style=" fill:#EEE" />
<g animation='scaleY' ep='Toto' domain='137,140' fixed='bottom'>
  <path d="M30,180 l16,0 l0,-160 l-16,0 z" style=" fill:#A49" />
</g>
<g animation='translateY' ep='Toto' domain='137,140' width='160' direction='top'>
  <path d="M26,181 l24,0 l0,-2 l-24,0 z" style=" fill: #666" />
</g>
<g x='20' y='200' animation='textBox' ep='Toto' textcolor='0$#00F;139$#F00' bgcolor='0$#FFF;139$#FDD'>-</g>


<!-- Vertical gauge EP Titi -->
<path d="M80,180 l16,0 l0,-160 l-16,0 z" style=" fill:#EEE" />
<g animation='scaleY' ep='Titi' domain='117,120' fixed='bottom'>
  <path d="M80,180 l16,0 l0,-160 l-16,0 z" style=" fill:#5C2" />
</g>
<g animation='translateY' ep='Titi' domain='117,120' width='160' direction='top'>
  <path d="M76,181 l24,0 l0,-2 l-24,0 z" style=" fill: #666" />
</g>
<g x='70' y='200' animation='textBox' ep='Titi' textcolor='0$#00F;118$#F00' bgcolor='0$#FFF;118$#FDD'>-</g>


<!-- Horizontal gauge EP Titi -->
<path d="M130,180 l160,0 l0,-16 l-160,0 z" style=" fill:#EEE" />
<g animation='scaleX' ep='Titi' domain='117,120' fixed='left'>
  <g animation='colour' ep='Titi' operators='<=$119$#8AE*>$118$#45C'>
    <path d="M130,180 l160,0 l0,-16 l-160,0 z" style=" fill:#67D" />
  </g>
</g>
<g animation='translateX' ep='Titi' domain='117,120' width='160' direction='right'>
  <path d="M129,184 l2,0 l0,-24 l-2,0 z" style=" fill: #666" />
</g>
<g x='214' y='201' animation='textBox' ep='Titi' textcolor='0$#00F;118$#F00' bgcolor='0$#FFF;118$#FDD'>-</g>
<text x="150" y="200" fill="#666" style="font-weight:bold;">EP [ Titi ] : </text>

<!-- Horizontal slider EP Toto -->
<path d="M340,175 l160,0 l0,-4, l-160,0 z" style=" fill: #EEE; stroke: #CCC;" />
<g animation='translateX' ep='Toto' domain='137,141' width='160'>
  <ellipse cx="340" cy="173" rx="8" ry="8" style="fill: #DDD; stroke: #CCC;" />
</g>
<g x='434' y='201' animation='textBox' ep='Toto' textcolor='0$#00F;139$#F00' bgcolor='0$#FFF;139$#FDD'>-</g>
<text x="370" y="200" fill="#666" style="font-weight:bold;">EP [ Toto ] : </text>

<!-- Knobe EP Titi -->
<circle r="50" cx="210" cy="90" stroke="#FDE47F" transform="rotate(126, 210, 90)" stroke-width="8" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="251, 360"></circle>
<g animation='rotate' ep='Titi' domain='117,121' angle='292' center='210,90'>
  <path d="M210,50 l4,40 q-4,4 -8,0 z" style="fill: #666" transform="rotate(-146, 210, 90)" />
</g>
<text x="148" y="140" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px">117</text>
<text x="204" y="30" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px">119</text>
<text x="252" y="140" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px">121</text>

<!-- Knobe EP Toto -->
<circle r="50" cx="420" cy="90" stroke="#FDE47F" transform="rotate(126, 420, 90)" stroke-width="8" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="251, 360"></circle>
<g animation='rotate' ep='Toto' domain='137,141' angle='292' center='420,90'>
  <g animation='colour' ep='Toto' operators='<=$139$#666*>$139$#c04000'>
    <path d="M420,50 l4,40 q-4,4 -8,0 z" style="fill: #666" transform="rotate(-146, 420, 90)" />
  </g>
</g>
<text x="358" y="140" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px">137</text>
<text x="414" y="30" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px">139</text>
<text x="462" y="140" fill="#999" style="font-weight:bold;font-size:11px">141</text>
